title: Really slow connection.
body: I am connecting really slowly and can't really start a game. I get into lobby, but can't click on start game or if I click, it doesn't really do anything. Tried restarting PC and internet router, but it doesnt really matter. Everything else works perfectly, just not the game.

replies.body: If you're still having those problems, check out the [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) we have up. Some EU players have been able to have success with the steps there or using a VPN. Let me know if none of that works and you still can't get in though!
